text:
I've been waiting for you to upload this. One of the best racing game songs of all time, and definitely the best F-Zero song for me. To me, it symbolizes ever present optimism in dire times, a light in the darkness if you will. 

Or it could just be a cool techno song about high speed futuristic racing.

author: CristianAragon1

text: I was never a fan of Dr. Stewart, but his theme was definitely one of the better ones. Thinking about this game, I really had a great time customizing my own vehicles. F-Zero GX had it all: amazing graphics that still hold up, perfect gameplay, very challenging races/missions, a giant cast of racers, customization options, a big soundtrack. Easily in my top 5 Gamecube games.
author: SupraDarky
